com.bizosys.hsearch.kv
Class Searcher

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.kv.Searcher

public class Searcher
extends java.lang.Object

The base class used for searching in a hsearch index.

search

                         java.lang.String selectQuery,

                         com.bizosys.hsearch.federate.FederatedSearchException,
                         java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                         java.text.ParseException
Search, Build Facet and Sort the result. Sorting happens when all values are out.

Parameters:
mergeId - - Search on the exact partition key
selectQuery - - Comma separated select fields
whereQuery - - The lucene style search query
facetFields - - Comma separated Facet fields : Null or String.Empty if none
sortFields - - Comma separated sort fields : Null or String.Empty if none
blankRow - - Requires as a template of the value object
enrichers - - Which all enrichers to apply once the result is out (Optional)
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException
java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
com.bizosys.hsearch.federate.FederatedSearchException

                                                                                                java.text.ParseException

Parameters:

facetFields - - Comma separated Facet fields : Null or String.Empty if none
